attributes.action: support the claims of Grand Duchess Maria Vladimirovna to the Russian Throne.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Grand Duchess Maria Vladimirovna of Russia is the Head of the Imperial Family of Russia and Titular Empress and Autocrat of All the Russias. The British Government (and the Royal Family should (i) apologise for abandoning Nicholas II and his family to the murderous Bolsheviks in 1918 (ii) support the Grand Duchess' claims to the Russian throne (iii) force 'President' Putin to reinstate all the powers and privileges of the Russian royal family and nobility and to relinquish control of Russia to the rightful heir (and descendents) of the Romanov dynasty.
